successes.title: .         Revolutionary speakers centered on your lifestyle
successes.description: A premium all-in-one wireless 360 speaker that delivers consistent sound, optimized to any space

Pledges.description: Receive a limited-edition ARCHT One T-shirt and be the first to know of our retail launch! Thank you!
SUPER EARLY BIRD - Congratulations! Be among the first to own an ARCHT One at an exclusive Kickstarter special discount of $300 off retail pricing of $599.
Choose between Piano Black or White
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Congratulations! Be among the first to own an ARCHT One at a fantastic Kickstarter special discount of $250 off retail pricing! of $599.
Choose between Piano Black or White
LAST CHANCE! - For this limited period, receive your ARCHT One at a one-time Kickstarter special discount of $200 off retail pricing of $599! We will never offer a discount of this magnitude again!
Choose between Piano Black or White

KICK STARTER SPECIAL EDITION - Specially for the kickstarter community, a truly unique discussion piece! This exclusive edition will feature the iconic Kickstarter GREEN with your name laser etched on the ARCHT One.

ROSSO CORSA RED - Dedicated to the adrenaline junky, an ARCHT One that will 'WOW' everyone. This ARCHT One is especially customized for your modern home decor, or flamboyant car. Comes with your name laser-etched on the ARCHT One.
